casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Felix Ricardo SALDIERNA 271PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 29, 2017 W. Rob Heroy, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Saldierna, Felix. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 28th of November 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th of November 2017."
